baby.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a very young child who has not yet learned to speak or walk
baby.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: She gave birth to a baby on Thursday.
What do you think of your new baby sister?
baby.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a type of vegetable which is grown to be much smaller than usual or is eaten before it has grown to its normal size
baby.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: a younger child in a family, often the youngest
baby.translation[0].definitions[3].examp: Clare is the baby of the family.
baby.translation[0].definitions[4].defin: used to address someone that you love
baby.translation[0].definitions[5].defin: used to address a young woman that you do not know
baby.translation[0].definitions[6].defin: someone, especially an older child, who is not behaving in a brave way
baby.translation[0].definitions[7].defin: something special that someone has developed or is responsible for
baby.translation[0].definitions[7].examp: Don’t ask me about the building contract – that’s Robert’s baby.
baby.translation[0].definitions[8].defin: something, especially a piece of equipment or a machine, that you care about a lot
baby.translation[0].definitions[8].examp: This baby can reach speeds of 130 miles per hour.
baby.translation[0].note_box[0].sections: Let me know as soon as the baby is born.
have a baby/give birth to a baby
She had the baby at home.
Sue gave birth to a baby boy.
She was three months pregnant when she lost the baby.
Usually your baby will be delivered by a midwife.
A disturbing number of babies are abandoned by their mothers.
If your baby cries, she may want feeding.
63% of new mothers breast-feed their babies.
Could you change the baby for me?
There’s plenty of help and advice for people with newborn babies.
Drinking alcohol is bad for your unborn baby.
Lesley’s baby was three weeks premature.
The abandoned baby was found under a hedge.
The number of illegitimate babies is rising.
Unwanted babies were frequently abandoned in the streets.
Danielle was a lovely contented baby.
She’s just had a lovely healthy baby girl.
We’d like a baby brother or sister for Ben.
baby.translation[0].note_box[1].sections: a very young child who has not yet learned to speak or walk
I sat next to a woman holding a baby.
a baby who has learned how to walk
The playground has a special area for toddlers.
a baby or a very young child
The disease is mainly found in infants.
a baby, or a small child up to the age of about three
How old is your little one?
the babies of an animal or bird
Kangaroos carry their young in a pouch.
a group of baby animals that are born at the same time to the same mother
Our cat has just had a litter of six kittens.
baby.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to be too kind to someone and look after them as if they were a baby
